item.title: [RS2] BumFighter vBeta /w Forms
item.dc:creator: @Bumis Bumis
item.description:
@Bumis wrote:

[quote=“Spky, post:17, topic:571”][quote author=Bumis link=topic=360.msg4332#msg4332 date=1142717729]
All MMouse does is takes the MoveMouseSmooth command[/quote]

And you’ve looked into this?[/quote]

Yes, I was wondering what made MMouse so undetectable, so I looked in the Include, and it was exactly what I was writing, just converting it to a shorter method.

RX (is example for a random integer)
I use MoveMouseSmooth(x+Random(RX)-random(RX),y+Random(RY)-random(RY))

MMouse just makes it so all I hafta type MMouse(X,Y,RX,RY), which does the Randoms for me, without the typing.

Making it shorter, but the exact same thing. I will using MMouse for now on although, for the sake of it being less typing.

Read full topic

But I am going to be using MMouse for now on[/quote]

Benmouse:=false

Benmouse:=true

Both used MMouse and multiple times before I terminated the script.

item.title: [RS2] BumFighter vBeta /w Forms
item.dc:creator: @Bumis Bumis
item.description:
@Bumis wrote:

All MMouse does is takes the MoveMouseSmooth command, and adds Randoms to it, which you define with the extra integers. I just did it manually by adding +Random(…)-random(…) So my way may take more time, but in really does about the same…

But I am going to be using MMouse for now on

Read full topic

Wait, I get it. Gradient and all that.

item.title: [RS2] BumFighter vBeta /w Forms
item.dc:creator: @Bumis Bumis
item.description:
@Bumis wrote:


Just spent a couple hours writing an RS2 AutoFighter. I wasn’t able to do this before I found this site, because I never knew about the include files, or how to get SCAR to read RS2 text.

I figured that out now, so I’m going to write a very big Autofighter. Here is a small taste of what it’ll do, and it’s undetectable. No includes required, I made sure that everything is Random to throw off detection. Just pick the color of the monster, start the script, and write it in the form, along with the case sensitive Monster Name. Put the tolerance ranging from 5-10.

Test it out, if you guys like it, I will hurry with updates.

program BumFighter;
{
  =============================================================================
   + BumFighter
     - Version: Beta
     - Released: 3/15/06
     
   + Updates
    
   + Author Comments
    -  I don't know how long you guys have been around RS Cheating. But you may
    remember the RSC AutoFighter I created that was very popular, sometime in
    2004. I've learned alot more about programming, and I plan to make this my
    best work to date.
    
   + You can check for script updates, and more of my work at my website.
     - Http://www.geocities.com/bumisd2yk4l/runescripts
  =============================================================================

}
var
 form,self: TForm;
 Application: TApplication;
 ButtonStart: TButton;
 Bevel1,Bevel3,Bevel4,Bevel5,Bevel6: TBevel;
 MonNameLabel,MonCol1,MonCol2,MonCol3,MonTolL: TLabel;
 MonsterNameTXT,MonColor1TXT,MonColor2TXT,MonColor3TXT,MonTolTXT: Tedit;
 
 x,y: Integer;
 Go: Integer;
 ScreenChars,ChatChars: Integer;
 MonMouse,MonDistance: Integer;
 Attacked: Integer;
 Fighting: Boolean;
 MonName,MonColor1,MonColor2,MonColor3,MonTol: String;
 
Procedure AdvancedSetup;
begin
 ScreenChars:= LoadChars2(AppPath + 'CharsRS22\');
 ChatChars:= LoadChars2(AppPath + 'CharsChat2\');
 MonDistance:=4
end;
  
Procedure Variables;
Begin
 Attacked:=0
 AdvancedSetup;
End;

Procedure Checks;
Begin
End;
  
Procedure Attack;
Begin
If Fighting=False Then
 Status('Attacking Another Monster')
 Begin
  If FindColorTolerance(x,y,StrToInt(MonColor1),20,20,510,330,StrToInt(MonTOL)) Or
     FindColorTolerance(x,y,StrToInt(MonColor2),20,20,510,330,StrToInt(MonTOL)) Or
     FindColorTolerance(x,y,StrToInt(MonColor3),20,20,510,330,StrToInt(MonTOL)) Then
   Begin
    MonMouse:=Random(4)
    Case MonMouse Of
     1: MoveMouseSmooth(x+Random(MonDistance),y+Random(MonDistance))
     2: MoveMouseSmooth(x-Random(MonDistance),y-Random(MonDistance))
     3: MoveMouseSmooth(x+Random(MonDistance),y-Random(MonDistance))
     4: MoveMouseSmooth(x-Random(MonDistance),y+Random(MonDistance))
    End;
    Wait(100+Random(100))
    If IsTextInAreaEx(53,6,117,22,x,y,(MonName),100,ScreenChars,True,false,0,1,57054) then
     Begin
      GetMousePos(x,y)
      ClickMouse(x,y,True)
      Attacked:=Attacked+1
      Wait(400+Random(400))
      GetMousePos(x,y)
      MoveMouseSmooth(x-Random(30)+Random(30),y-Random(30)+Random(30))
      Wait(1600+Random(400))
     End
   End;
  End;
End;

Procedure InFight;
Begin
 If not FindColorTolerance(x,y,65280,5,5,500,350,10) Then
   Begin
    Fighting:=False;
    Wait(500+Random(500))
    Attack;
   End;
 If FindColorTolerance(x,y,65280,5,5,500,350,10) Then
  Begin
   Fighting:=True
   Status('In a fight!')
   GetMousePos(x,y)
   MoveMouseSmooth(x-Random(60)+Random(60),y-Random(60)+Random(60))
   Wait(400+Random(200))
   MoveMouseSmooth(x-Random(60)+Random(60),y-Random(60)+Random(60))
  End;
End;


procedure Startbuttonclick(sender: TObject);
begin
 Montoltxt.text:= '10'
 MonName:=MonsterNameTXT.Text;
 MonColor1:=MonColor1TXT.text;
 MonColor2:=MonColor2txt.text;
 MonColor3:=MonColor3txt.text;
 MonTol:=Montoltxt.text;
 GO:=1;
end;

begin
  Application:= GetApplication;
  Self:= GetSelf;
  Form:= TForm.Create(nil);
  Form.Font.Color :=clRed
  Form.Font.Name:='Times New Roman';
  Form.Width := 250;
  Form.Height := 232;
  Form.Position := poScreenCenter;
  Form.BorderStyle := bsDialog;
  Form.Color:=ClBlue;
  Form.Caption := 'BumFighter vBeta';
  
  ButtonStart:= TButton.Create(Form);
  ButtonStart.Left := 10;
  ButtonStart.Top := 170;
  ButtonStart.Width := 80;
  ButtonStart.Height := 24;
  ButtonStart.Caption := '&Begin';
  ButtonStart.OnClick := @Startbuttonclick;
  ButtonStart.Parent := Form;
  ButtonStart.Default := True;
  ButtonStart.ModalResult := mrOk;
  
  MonsterNameTXT := TEdit.Create(Form);
  MonsterNameTXT.Top := 18;
  MonsterNameTXT.Left := 133;
  MonsterNameTXT.Width := 100;
  MonsterNameTXT.Hint:='Monster Color 2';
  MonsterNameTXT.ShowHint:=true
  MonsterNameTXT.Parent := Form;
  
  MonColor1TXT := TEdit.Create(Form);
  MonColor1TXT.Top := 48;
  MonColor1TXT.Left := 133;
  MonColor1TXT.Width := 100;
  MonColor1TXT.Hint:='Monster Color 1';
  MonColor1TXT.ShowHint:=true
  MonColor1TXT.Parent := Form;
  
  MonColor2TXT := TEdit.Create(Form);
  MonColor2TXT.Top := 78;
  MonColor2TXT.Left := 133;
  MonColor2TXT.Width := 100;
  MonColor2TXT.Hint:='Monster Color 2';
  MonColor2TXT.ShowHint:=true
  MonColor2TXT.Parent := Form;
  
  MonColor3TXT := TEdit.Create(Form);
  MonColor3TXT.Top := 108;
  MonColor3TXT.Left := 133;
  MonColor3TXT.Width := 100;
  MonColor3TXT.Hint:='Monster Color 2';
  MonColor3TXT.ShowHint:=true
  MonColor3TXT.Parent := Form;
  
  MonTolTXT := TEdit.Create(Form);
  MonTolTXT.Top := 138;
  MonTolTXT.Left := 133;
  MonTolTXT.Width := 100;
  MonTolTXT.Hint:='Monster Color 2';
  MonTolTXT.ShowHint:=true
  MonTolTXT.Parent := Form;
  
  MonNameLabel := TLabel.Create(Form);
  MonNameLabel.Top := 20;
  MonNameLabel.Left := 10;
  MonNameLabel.Font.Name := 'MS Sans Serif';
  MonNameLabel.Font.Color := ClWhite;
  MonNameLabel.Font.Size := 12;
  MonNameLabel.Caption := 'Monster Name:';
  MonNameLabel.Parent := Form;
  
  MonCol1 := TLabel.Create(Form);
  MonCol1.Top := 50;
  MonCol1.Left := 10;
  MonCol1.Font.Name := 'MS Sans Serif';
  MonCol1.Font.Color := ClWhite;
  MonCol1.Font.Size := 12;
  MonCol1.Caption := 'Monster Color 1:';
  MonCol1.Parent := Form;
  
  MonCol2 := TLabel.Create(Form);
  MonCol2.Top := 80;
  MonCol2.Left := 10;
  MonCol2.Font.Name := 'MS Sans Serif';
  MonCol2.Font.Color := ClWhite;
  MonCol2.Font.Size := 12;
  MonCol2.Caption := 'Monster Color 2:';
  MonCol2.Parent := Form;
  
  MonCol3 := TLabel.Create(Form);
  MonCol3.Top := 110;
  MonCol3.Left := 10;
  MonCol3.Font.Name := 'MS Sans Serif';
  MonCol3.Font.Color := ClWhite;
  MonCol3.Font.Size := 12;
  MonCol3.Caption := 'Monster Color 3:';
  MonCol3.Parent := Form;
  
  MonTolL := TLabel.Create(Form);
  MonTolL.Top := 140;
  MonTolL.Left := 10;
  MonTolL.Font.Name := 'MS Sans Serif';
  MonTolL.Font.Color := ClWhite;
  MonTolL.Font.Size := 12;
  MonTolL.Caption := 'Color Tolerance:';
  MonTolL.Parent := Form;

  
  Bevel1:= TBevel.Create(Form);
  Bevel1.Left := 5;
  Bevel1.Top := 10;
  Bevel1.Width := 1;
  Bevel1.Height := 187;
  Bevel1.Parent := Form;

  Bevel3:= TBevel.Create(Form);
  Bevel3.Left := 5;
  Bevel3.Top := 10;
  Bevel3.Width := 383;
  Bevel3.Height := 1;
  Bevel3.Parent := Form;
  
  Bevel4:= TBevel.Create(Form);
  Bevel4.Left := 5;
  Bevel4.Top := 195;
  Bevel4.Width := 383;
  Bevel4.Height := 1;
  Bevel4.Parent := Form;
  
  Bevel5:= TBevel.Create(Form);
  Bevel5.Left := 5;
  Bevel5.Top := 168;
  Bevel5.Width := 88;
  Bevel5.Height := 1;
  Bevel5.Parent := Form;
  
  Bevel6:= TBevel.Create(Form);
  Bevel6.Left := 93;
  Bevel6.Top := 168;
  Bevel6.Width := 1;
  Bevel6.Height := 27;
  Bevel6.Parent := Form;
  
  Form.ShowModal;
  Form.Free;

  if go=1 then
  begin
   Variables;


    repeat
     InFight;
     Checks;
     Wait(800+Random(400))
    until(false)
  end;
end.

Read full topic
